jflowmap.data

Class StaxGraphMLReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • jflowmap.data.StaxGraphMLReader

  • public class StaxGraphMLReader
extends java.lang.Object
    GraphML reader able of loading several graphs in one file. It's based on StAX and therefore requires much less memory than GraphMLReader2 and works faster.
    Author:
    Ilya Boyandin
